name: slackness
content:
slackness noun [U]
(NOT ACTIVE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being slower and less active than usual: Low sales figures were partly because of normal mid-summer slackness in/of demand.
disapproving the fact that a person or organization is not working as well or as hard as they should: The inspector criticized the slackness and incompetence of the staff.
